Service.title: Service
Service.description: Represents a specific hosting or technical support service offered by SteadyNode, showcasing its features and value proposition.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Service entity.

name.description: The official name of the service (e.g., 'Cloud Hosting Standard', '24/7 Priority Support').

tagline.description: A concise, catchy phrase summarizing the core benefit or purpose of the service.

description.description: A comprehensive description of the service, including its functionalities, benefits, and target audience.

iconUrl.description: The URL to an SVG or image icon representing the service, for UI display.

category.description: The broad category the service belongs to (e.g., 'Hosting Solutions', 'Technical Support').

features.description: An array of individual features or key selling points included with this service.
